error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?

stringIncludes.ts(3,20): error TS2339: Property 'includes' does not exist on type '"abcde"'.

==== stringIncludes.ts (2 errors) ====
    var includes: boolean;
    includes = "abcde".includes("cd");
                       ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'includes' does not exist on type '"abcde"'.
    includes = "abcde".includes("cd", 2);
                       ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'includes' does not exist on type '"abcde"'.
